Scripts.Text:
// Sets Ingo's clothes to Child-era ones
proc ChildTimeline
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_0 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_1 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_2 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_3 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_4 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_5 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_6 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_7 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_8 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_9 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_10 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_11 not_visible
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_12 not_visible
endproc

// Sets Ingo's clothes to Adult-era ones
proc AdultTimeline
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_0 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_1 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_2 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_3 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_4 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_5 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_6 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_7 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_8 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_9 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_10 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_11 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Dlist_12 in_skeleton
endproc

if var.1 == 0
    talk Begin

        set talk_mode true
        face self towards player

        // Make sure we don't exit the talking state when the textbox closes
        set TALK_PERSIST true
        await talking_end

        // Spin 1080 degrees, 80 degrees per frame
        play sfx NA_SE_EN_PO_KANTERA
        rotation rotate_by self 0 DEG_1080 0 DEG_80
        ::ChildTimeline
        
        show_textbox Begin_2
        await textbox_num 2
        set animation Stand

        set TALK_PERSIST true
        await talking_end

        // Spin -1080 degrees, 80 degrees per frame
        play sfx NA_SE_EN_PO_KANTERA
        rotation rotate_by self 0 DEG_-1080 0 DEG_80
        ::AdultTimeline   

        show_textbox Phew
        await talking_end

        set TALK_PERSIST false
        set talk_mode false
        set var.1 = 1

    endtalk
elif var.1 == 1
    talk Sick
         set talk_mode true
         face self towards player
         await textbox_num 2
         set animation Aaaa
         await talking_end
         set talk_mode false
         set var.1 = 2
    endtalk
elif var.1 == 2
    talk Question
         set animation Stand
         set talk_mode true
        
         // Setup question
         set response_actions resp_yes resp_no
         face self towards player
         await textbox_num 2
         set animation snivel
         await response
    endtalk

return

resp_yes:
    set animation Smug
    set player_rupees -= 100
    show_textbox Trick
    await talking_end

    particle EXPLOSION
        scale 20
        velocity 0 0 0
        acceleration 0 0 0 
        position relative 0 20 0
        scale_update 20
    endparticle

    play sfx NA_SE_EN_AWA_BREAK

    // Change Ingo's head to Malon's, change the mapped texture to Malon's face texture, move the facial hair into position
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_8 Malon
    set dlist_visibility MalonHead replaces_limb
    set dlist_visibility Stache in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Eye1 in_skeleton
    set dlist_visibility Eye2 in_skeleton

    await frames 15

    // Play shocked animation with Link
    set PLAYER_ANIMATE_MODE true
    set player_animation CLINK_DEMO_KOUTAI_KENNUKI 1 255
    play sfx NA_SE_VO_LI_FALL_L_KID
    play sfx NA_SE_EN_STAL_WARAU
    await frames 100
    set PLAYER_ANIMATE_MODE false
    
    show_textbox Scram
    await talking_end
    set talk_mode false 
    return
resp_no:
    set animation stand
    show_textbox Scram
    await talking_end
    set talk_mode false
    set var.1 = 2
elif var.1 == 3
    talk MalonBum
        set animation stand
        set talk_mode true
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        play sfx NA_SE_EN_PO_KANTERA
        rotation rotate_by self 0 DEG_1080 0 DEG_80
        ::ChildTimeline
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endif
Scripts.Name: Talk

Messages.Name: Begin
Messages.MessageText:
Wa ha ha ha!
<New Box>
I can change my clothes just by
spinning around! Look and marvel!

Messages.Name: Begin_2
Messages.MessageText:
See, I look like a bum, now!
Isn't it great?
<New Box>
...
<New Box>
...Wait, why on earth would I do 
that?

Messages.Name: Sick
Messages.MessageText:
I ain't doing that again.
<New box>
I feel kinda sick, actually.
Must've been all the spinnin'

Messages.Name: Question
Messages.MessageText:
I said "NO".
Do you know what "no" means?!
<New Box>
<Two choices>Unless... you're willing to pay me 
all your money for my magic tricks?<G>
Pay the discount Luigi
Save your money

Messages.Name: Trick
Messages.MessageText:
Heheheh... how about THIS magic 
trick?!

Messages.Name: MalonBum
Messages.MessageText:
You want Malon-me to be a bum, too?
<New box>
Good Hylia, kid, you're weird, you
know that?
<New box>
But... fine. Sure. Why not.

GlobalHeaders.Text:
#define actor.posX actorf.0x24
#define actor.posY actorf.0x28 
#define actor.posZ actorf.0x2C 
#define actor.dirX actor16.0x30 
#define actor.dirY actor16.0x32 
#define actor.dirZ actor16.0x34 

#define actor.homePosX actorf.0x8 
#define actor.homePosY actorf.0xC 
#define actor.homePosZ actorf.0x10 
#define actor.homeDirX actor16.0x12 
#define actor.homeDirY actor16.0x14 
#define actor.homeDirZ actor16.0x16 
                
#define actor.scaleX actorf.0x50 
#define actor.scaleY actorf.0x54 
#define actor.scaleZ actorf.0x58 

#define actor.velocityX actorf.0x5C 
#define actor.velocityY actorf.0x60 
#define actor.velocityZ actorf.0x64 

#define actor.rotX actor16.0xB4 
#define actor.rotY actor16.0xB6 
#define actor.rotZ actor16.0xB8
GlobalHeaders.Name: Definitions

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc basic_talk textbox
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation 0
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc


proc talk_with_anim textbox talk_animation
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation talk_animation
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set animation 0
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc
GlobalHeaders.Name: Macros
